en.today: It could take extra time to find your bearings this morning, dear ram, as Venus and Saturn form an unbalanced aspect. Try not to rush, and be mindful to tackle tasks in order of importance. As the moon continues its journey through your sign, many will look to you for leadership. Meanwhile, Mars and Neptune join forces to assist with carrying out moves that will reinforce your most transformative visions. Believe in the possibility of change, both internally and professionally, as well as within your partnerships. Connect with yourself later tonight when Luna and Chiron unite, asking you to prioritize healing and self-love.

en.today: Notice how others influence your perspective this morning, dear Leo, as Venus and Saturn form an unbalanced aspect. Smooth talkers can cause your guard to slip, while wishful thinking may lead to ignoring the facts. Luckily, the Aries moon brings a layer of spiritual protection your way, so work closely with your higher power. Gut instincts kick in once Mars and Neptune align, encouraging you to nurture big dreams through meaningful effort. Prioritize decisions that evolve your situation in a positive direction. Luna and Chiron unite to provide healing later tonight, marking the ideal time to meditate, pray, and make wishes.

en.today: It could be challenging to maintain boundaries within your social sphere this morning, dear Taurus, as Venus and Saturn form an unbalanced aspect. If your phone pings nonstop and time slips through your fingers while answering messages, it may be wise to silence notifications and focus on work. Luckily, the Aries moon grants permission to keep a low profile, putting you in a standoffish mood. Mars and Neptune align this evening, encouraging you to selectively connect with peers who motivate you to create, chase dreams, and feed passions. Shower yourself with positive affirmations to heal wounds when Chiron stirs tonight.

en.today: It will be challenging to juggle what you want to be doing with what you should be doing, dear Gemini. As Venus and Saturn form an unbalanced aspect, tackle responsibilities first so you have time to play later. Prioritizing long-term goals with a creative element will make it easier to find your groove, thanks to an auspicious alignment between Mars and Neptune. This celestial exchange allows you to blast through barriers you once considered impenetrable. A sweet and social energy descends tonight while the Aries moon and Chiron unite, helping you establish a healthy position within your community.

kh.today: វានឹងមានបញ្ហាប្រឈមក្នុងការស្វែងរកអ្វីដែលអ្នកចង់ធ្វើជាមួយអ្វីដែលអ្នកគួរធ្វើ, Gemini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់។ក្នុងនាមជា Venus និង Saturn បង្កើតបានជាទិដ្ឋភាពដែលមិនមានតុល្យភាព, ដោះស្រាយទំនួលខុសត្រូវជាមុនដូច្នេះអ្នកមានពេលវេលាដើម្បីលេងនៅពេលក្រោយ។អាទិភាពដល់គោលដៅរយៈពេលវែងជាមួយនឹងធាតុច្នៃប្រឌិតនឹងធ្វើឱ្យវាកាន់តែងាយស្រួលក្នុងការស្វែងរកចង្អូររបស់អ្នកអរគុណចំពោះការតម្រឹមដែលគួរឱ្យស្អប់រវាងភពព្រះអង្គារនិង Neptune ។ការផ្លាស់ប្តូរសេឡេស្ទាលនេះអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យអ្នកផ្ទុះតាមរយៈរបាំងដែលអ្នកធ្លាប់ត្រូវបានគេចាត់ទុកថាមិនអាចការពារបាន។ថាមពលផ្អែមល្ហែមនិងសង្គមបានចុះមកនៅយប់នេះខណៈដែលលោក Aries Moon និង Chander Unite ជួយអ្នកក្នុងការបង្កើតជំហរដែលមានសុខភាពល្អនៅក្នុងសហគមន៍របស់អ្នក។
